backend/main.mo: Backend canister defining admin login with hardcoded credentials and a full trucking domain model including clients, transporters, loads, tracking, and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing admin‑login related fixes, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Map of frontend file paths to short functional summaries describing routing, UI components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/.gitignore: Git ignore rules for dependencies, build outputs, environment files, IDE files, and Capacitor Android/iOS artifacts.
frontend/ADMIN_ACCESS.md: Documentation explaining the password‑based admin auth flow, token handling, route protection, and backend integration.
frontend/ANDROID_BUILD.md: Guide for building Android APK/AAB files and preparing the app for Play Store publishing with required tools and steps.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration defining app metadata, web directory, and Android keystore build options.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables for light/dark modes and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/android/_signing-env.ex: Example environment variable template for Android signing credentials.
frontend/scripts/android/build-debug-apk: Bash script that builds a debug Android APK, checking prerequisites, building the web app, syncing, and running Gradle.
frontend/scripts/android/build-release-a: Builds a signed Android App Bundle, validating env vars, building the web app, syncing Capacitor, and running Gradle to produce a release AAB.
Builds a signed release APK for distribution outside Play Store, performing signing checks, building the web app, syncing Capacitor, and running Gradle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app root with React Query, theme provider, router, and global toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/LocationEv: Displays submitted location evidence for a transporter, including timestamps, coordinates, and screenshot viewing via a dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/Transporte: Renders a list of transporters with details, live location info, truck type, and status, including timestamp formatting and stale checks.
Provides filters for transporter listings, including toggling visibility for missing locations and selecting truck types.
Shows transporters with locations using a simple grid-based map-style layout, including selection and detailed info display.
Displays transporter locations with filters, a map view fallback, and a list view while handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSnippetPre: Renders an iframe preview of an ad snippet with load/error diagnostics and fallback messaging for empty snippets.
frontend/src/components/ads/BottomAd.tsx: Shows a dismissible bottom-page ad that loads dynamic settings and renders an ad snippet preview or an empty state message.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with support contact info and navigation options for home or admin login.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteE: Error boundary for admin routes that resets queries and shows a retry state when admin verification fails.
Shows an admin access error with retry and sign‑out actions that clear tokens and cached queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminSignIn: Prompts users to sign in with admin credentials and provides contact info for access requests.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles login and logout via Internet Identity with loading states and optional post‑login callback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for creating a basic user profile with name and email, using a save mutation and validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Guards admin‑only content by checking admin status, handling verification errors, and redirecting unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with company info, navigation links, coverage areas, and a dynamic year plus referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main page layout including top navigation, routed content, bottom ad, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Implements the responsive top navigation bar with links, login controls, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadIntere: Provides a dialog for capturing location evidence and uploading screenshots with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadLocati: Displays pickup and drop-off locations with icons when available.
frontend/src/components/transporter/Live: Shows transporter live‑location status and lets users start or stop real‑time location sharing.
frontend/src/components/transporter/Tran: Allows transporters to view and update their operational status with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/config/adminBootstrap.ts: Handles retrieving and validating the build‑time admin bootstrap principal from environment variables.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Defines ad configuration, default ad snippet, and functions to load and save ad settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/constants/adminToken.ts: Provides shared constants for admin token storage and change event names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Provides mutation hooks for granting or bootstrapping admin access and invalidates related admin queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminToken.ts: Tracks the admin token stored in sessionStorage and updates reactively on custom token‑change events.
Verifies admin access by initializing the actor with the admin token and exposes a hook to trigger verification.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Aggregates identity, admin token, role, and profile queries to compute authentication, loading, and admin state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout functions, and manages identity loading and lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains various react‑query hooks for backend operations including admin checks, client management, contact messages, and transporter actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransporterLiveLoc: Manages periodic transporter geolocation updates, handling permissions, errors, and update scheduling.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile and role, with identity‑aware query enabling.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables with global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the company’s About page with story, mission, values, and regional coverage sections.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements the admin dashboard with load management, user verification, APK link settings, ads, and data tables using various queries.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPasswordLoginPag: Provides password-based admin login with diagnostic steps, token handling, and verification retry logic.
frontend/src/pages/ClientRegistrationPag: Handles client registration, form state, contract data submission, and displays verification status.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form and displays company contact information with form submission via backend.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Renders the contracts interface, allowing authenticated and verified users to post contracts and view existing ones with date validation and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the marketing homepage with hero content, testimonials, calls to action, and optional profile setup modal.
frontend/src/pages/LoadBoardPage.tsx: Provides load posting and browsing features for clients and transporters, including file uploads, truck type selection, and interest submission.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a list of logistics services and a simple how‑it‑works section using static content.
frontend/src/pages/TransporterRegistrati: Handles transporter registration and editing of details, including document uploads, contract info, and truck type selection.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the app’s routing structure using TanStack Router, mapping all pages to their respective paths.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Provides a CSV export helper that converts object arrays to CSV strings and triggers a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, issues, and existing admin‑login–related fix features.
